dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Breaking news: Italian Prime Minister Giorgia Meloni's visit to Kazakhstan has been postponed.

dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The planned visit of Italian Prime Minister Giorgia Meloni to Kazakhstan, as well as the first "Central Asia " Italy" summit, have been postponed, according to presidential advisor and press secretary Ruslan Zheldibay.

dialogue_turns.text: Oh, really? I was actually looking forward to that summit. What happened?

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, apparently it's because of her participation in mourning events for Pope Francis. That's, uh, a pretty significant reason to reschedule.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, apparently it's because of her participation in mourning events for Pope Francis. That's, uh, a pretty significant reason to reschedule.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: At the request of the Italian side, the planned visit of Prime Minister Giorgia Meloni to Kazakhstan and the first 'Central Asia " Italy' summit are being postponed due to her participation in mourning events following the death of Pope Francis.

dialogue_turns.text: Right, and she was supposed to be there on April 26th and 27th, wasn't she? That's this weekend.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly. And the first Central Asia-Italy summit was set for the 27th too. Both events are now up in the air while they figure out new dates.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: It's interesting thoughâ€”this isn't their first meeting. They met back in January in Rome at Palazzo Chigi, right?

dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In January 2024, Kassym-Jomart Tokayev paid an official visit to Italy. His meeting with Giorgia Meloni took place at the historic Palazzo Chigi in Rome, which has a history spanning three centuries.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, and Tokayev even wished her a happy birthday during Abu Dhabi Sustainability Week earlier this year. They seem to have built a pretty solid rapport.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, and Tokayev even wished her a happy birthday during Abu Dhabi Sustainability Week earlier this year. They seem to have built a pretty solid rapport.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: For sure. And Meloni's the first woman to lead Italy's government, which is a big deal historically.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: For sure. And Meloni's the first woman to lead Italy's government, which is a big deal historically.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Giorgia Meloni has been the first woman in Italian history to serve as President of the Council of Ministers since October 22, 2022.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Absolutely. I'm curious what this means for the strategic partnership talks they were planning. Hopefully the postponement doesn't slow things down too much.
